text.sentence: << File: Activity Charges Keoni no edits.doc
Harvey had created the above document that shows the ISO Charges that occur due Firm and Non-Firm Imports and Exports and Load.
I had Keoni look it over and edit Harvey's file...And here is the version not showing Keoni's edits.
Please forward me the version w/ Keoni's comments.
<< File: Activity Charges Keoni.doc
There you go! How is Houston?
Jim, We are missing one significant piece of info in this document.
We need to add the charges associated Positive and Negative Load Deviation (Penalty Charges).
I don't think that there are any for Positive Dev., but I know that there are charges associated to Neg.
Dev.
I will ask Keoni about this.
This is one request of Chris.
Is he talking about 403 with 111-116?
There are no "penalty charges" associated with loads, just the load deviation charges such as replacement reserves.
text.signature: Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone: 916/608-7053 pager: 916/814-7352 alpha page: 9169812000.1151268@pagenet.net e-mail: <mailto:kalmeida@caiso.com

text.sentence: This is what Keoni says: See below.
I have placed all the numbers on the Charge Names and am putting together a list of what is missing from this document.
Keoni, I realize that there are no penalty charges associated to Load, I am referring to the neg.
and positive load deviation.
What are all of the charges associated to the penalties for deviation from schedule.
Ps Jim, take your best cut at what you think these charges are and then get Keoni too sign off on what results you come up with.
We need to put every charge that we think is linked to a schedule and then just have Keoni fill in the gaps and sign off on the document.
